metadata.title: CVE-2022-0800 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Cast UI in Google Chrome prior to 99.0.4844.51allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
